title: The Bradman era
creator_credit: Albie Thoms, ABC Video and Jack Egan
brief_description: This film, a companion to the book, traces the career of Sir Donald Bradman from the early 1930s through until 1948 when he led an undefeated Australian team in England in his last test series. The film also contains coverage of many of the controversial incidents during the “Bodyline” series in 1932-33 and shows the great players in action. Rated: G
creator_credit_for_label: Albie Thoms, ABC Video and Jack Egan
